refnamediv.refpurpose: Run Spotlight searches against an SMB server

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This tool is part of the samba 1 suite.
mdfind is a simple utility to run Spotlight searches against an SMB server that runs the Spotlight mdssvc RPC service.

listitem.para: The SMB server name or IP address to connect to.
